methods.name: initialize
title: Google
Cloud
Error#initialize
methods.description: Construct a new Google::Cloud::Error object, optionally passing in a message.

methods.name: cause
title: Google
Cloud
Error#cause
methods.description: The previous exception at the time this exception was raised. This is useful for wrapping exceptions and retaining the original exception information.

methods.name: status_code
title: Google
Cloud
Error#status_code
methods.description:
Returns the value of status_code from the underlying cause error object, if both are present. Otherwise returns nil.

This is typically present on errors originating from calls to an API over HTTP/REST.
